price: 78. Mpe na kati na bango, ezali na baye bayebi kotanga te mpe kokoma te, mpe bayebi buku te, bobele komizwa, mpe bango bazali bobele na makanisi.
arabic: وَمِنۡهُمۡ أُمِّيُّونَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّآ أَمَانِيَّ وَإِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَظُنُّونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum ummiyyūna lā yaʿlamūna al-kitāba illā amāniyya wa-in hum illā yaẓunnūna
